about.title: About
about.content_p1: BestOfGames is a curated collection of indie game reviews. We focus on stylish, bite-sized insights that help you discover your next favorite title.
about.content_p2: This project is built with the goal of showcasing modern web tooling and sharing passion for unique gaming experiences. All reviews are written with care and aim to highlight what makes each game special.
about.content_p3: Want to get in touch? Feel free to reach out via our contact page or follow us on social media. We're always happy to hear your feedback and suggestions.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we handle your data.
privacy.data_collection_content: We collect minimal data necessary to provide our services. This includes anonymous usage statistics and, if you enable push notifications, your subscription endpoint.
privacy.cookies_content: We use essential cookies to remember your preferences like theme settings and wishlist items. These are stored locally in your browser.
privacy.third_party_content: We may link to external services like Steam for game purchases. These services have their own privacy policies.
privacy.contact_content: If you have any questions about our privacy practices, please contact us.
